source: TEXT_GAIUSB606_00888_SEQ_00<tab>Maucolyn's teeth are chattering from something other than cold, and he has the beseeching look of one seeking an adventurer's cure to a nasty ill.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB606_00888_SEQ_00<tab>チョコボ厩務員のマーコリンは、何かに激しく怯えているようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB606_00888_SEQ_01<tab>Maucolyn's visit to the snowhouse has given him a bad fright. A voice without a mouth is troubling indeed, and you have been tasked with discovering what it is that speaks in the icy shelter.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB606_00888_SEQ_01<tab>なんでも、誰もいない場所から声が聞こえるという。マーコリンが声を聞いたスノーハウス付近で、声の正体を探ろう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB606_00888_SEQ_02<tab>The speaker is a melting snowman, built by some knight in a carefree moment. Its sorrow at the impending thaw has given it voice. Reach across the vast gulf of common sense and /rally the snowman.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB606_00888_SEQ_02<tab>声の正体は、なんと雪だるまだった。溶けかかっている様子の雪だるま。雪だるまにエモート「励ます」をしよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB606_00888_SEQ_03<tab>Your discomfort with this relationship is all too obvious. The snowman is affronted, and you fear the anger will further unfreeze his flesh. /soothe him or you shall be responsible for his sad demise.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB606_00888_SEQ_03<tab>冒険者の態度に怒った様子の雪だるま。ご機嫌をとるため、エモート「なだめる」をしよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB606_00888_SEQ_04<tab>Your attempt to comfort the man of snow is well played─desperation has birthed many great moments in acting. The snowman is in an expansive mood, though still melancholy. Unearth your inner lickspittle and /cheer him with all your heart.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB606_00888_SEQ_04<tab>機嫌がなおった様子の雪だるまに、エモート「応援する」をしよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB606_00888_SEQ_05<tab>Sometimes, passions burn the brightest when the end is near. His ardor enkindled by your lusty cheer, the snowman demands you /blowkiss to him as proof of your fondness.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB606_00888_SEQ_05<tab>雪だるまは調子にのっているようだ。雪だるまにエモート「投げキッス」をしよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB606_00888_SEQ_06<tab>In a few minutes with you, the snowman has lived a lifetime─and now he is ready to go quietly into that good night. Tell him /goodbye.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB606_00888_SEQ_06<tab>雪だるまは満足したようだ。雪だるまにエモート「さようなら」をしよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB606_00888_SEQ_07<tab>The snowman subsides into silence. Tears prickle your eyelids but you do not weep, for you know the pain of frostbitten cheeks. Maucolyn will learn the truth, and mayhap weep in your stead.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB606_00888_SEQ_07<tab>雪だるまは冒険者に別れを告げ、そして沈黙した。チョコボ厩務員のマーコリンに報告しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB606_00888_SEQ_08<tab>Maucolyn happily dismisses the talking snowman as a youthful prank. A happy customer means a job well done, but your heart tells you it was no mummery.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB606_00888_SEQ_08<tab>マーコリンは雪だるまが喋ったことを、まるで信じてくれなかった。あれは吹雪の中で見た幻想だったのだろうか……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB606_00888_TODO_00<tab>Locate the source of the voice.

target: TEXT_GAIUSB606_00888_TODO_02<tab>雪だるまに「なだめる」をする
TEXT_GAIUSB606_00888_TODO_03<tab>雪だるまに「応援する」をする
TEXT_GAIUSB606_00888_TODO_04<tab>雪だるまに「投げキッス」をする
TEXT_GAIUSB606_00888_TODO_05<tab>雪だるまに「さようなら」をする

source: TEXT_GAIUSB606_00888_MAUCOLYN_000_000<tab>I need to talk to you, adventurer. I was down in the snowhouse, keepin' outta the wind, when I heard whispers─I swear it on the lives of my chocobos. I couldn't see anyone in there, but I'm sure I heard somethin'!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB606_00888_MAUCOLYN_000_000なぁ、き、聞いてくれよ！
さっき、スノーハウスで暖をとってたらよォ、
誰もいないのに、なんかヒソヒソと声が聞こえるんだよ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSB606_00888_MAUCOLYN_000_001<tab>Go an' see who 'twas, else I don't know how I'll sleep tonight.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB606_00888_MAUCOLYN_000_001た、頼む。原因をつきとめてくれないか！？
じゃねェと、怖くて夜も眠れねェよぅ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSB606_00888_SNOWMAN_000_010<tab>(-Snowman-)Hello, I are snowman, man of snow; dripping we is, our hold on life slipping...
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB606_00888_SNOWMAN_000_010(-雪だるま-)オはろー　俺　雪ダルマ。
……ヤバイ……ヤバイヨ……。
溶ケカカッテル　完全ニ溶ケカカッテル……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB606_00888_SNOWMAN_000_011<tab>(-Snowman-)Sad I are so many dreams we had; <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>rally<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> my spirits, won't you, ere the finale...
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB606_00888_SNOWMAN_000_011(-雪だるま-)人ノ夢ト書イテ「儚イ」……何カ物悲シイワネ……。
誰カ俺ヲ　励マシテ　クレナイカナ……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB606_00888_SNOWMAN_000_020<tab>(-Snowman-)Profane you do our pain with a rally so mundane! As to shelter with a booth, my icebound heart do <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>soothe<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB606_00888_SNOWMAN_000_020(-雪だるま-)ムキーッ！　オ前　気持チガ　コモッテナイ！
ソンナ　冷タイ態度ジャ　ダメ！
……アッ　俺ノ方ガ　冷タイカ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB606_00888_SNOWMAN_000_030<tab>(-Snowman-)Willing I are to take the top billing; a battery of gallantry from the artillery of flattery; <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>cheer<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> us until dry are the tears...
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB606_00888_SNOWMAN_000_030(-雪だるま-)フフン　人間ニ　気ヲ使ワレルノモ
悪イ気分ジャナイナ……　モット「応援」シテクレ！
大キクナレトカ！　丸マレトカ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSB606_00888_SNOWMAN_000_040<tab>(-Snowman-)Like me you do really twice does lightning strike? <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Kiss<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> me, friend, if us you'll miss! Throw it, though, not nice to smooch on snow.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB606_00888_SNOWMAN_000_040(-雪だるま-)ウ～ン　てんしょん　上ガッテキターッ！
オ前　俺好キカ？　好キダッタラ「きっす」シテクレ！
「世界一　ぴゅあ　ナ　きっす」クレクレッ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSB606_00888_SNOWMAN_000_050<tab>(-Snowman-)Farewell, adventurer, so many troubles you quell. Peace we is at, drunk we have life to the lees. <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Bye-bye<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, world, all that lives must someday die...
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB606_00888_SNOWMAN_000_050(-雪だるま-)雪ダルマ　ダケニ　手モ足モ　出ナイケド
アリガトウ……　俺　満足……。
ソロソロ　コノ　世界トモ　オ別レネ……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB606_00888_SNOWMAN_000_100<tab>(-Snowman-)Lackluster you are, no energy can you muster. Pfeph!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB606_00888_SNOWMAN_000_100(-雪だるま-)チガウ　チガウ！　ソレチガウ！
オ前　雪ダルマ　ナメルト　「永久氷晶」食ラワスゾ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSB606_00888_SNOWMAN_000_110<tab>(-Snowman-)Bye-bye, cruel world, love is a lie and adventurers soon die.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB606_00888_SNOWMAN_000_110(-雪だるま-)ウウ　寒イ……。
……ヒ　ヒ　ヒェックション！

source: TEXT_GAIUSB606_00888_MAUCOLYN_000_080<tab>Did ye find out who was talkin'? I can see from your aspect ye did!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB606_00888_MAUCOLYN_000_080……どうだった？
ヒソヒソ話をしていた奴の正体はわかったか？

source: TEXT_GAIUSB606_00888_MAUCOLYN_000_081<tab>A snowman? Ye don't say. An' speakin' in rude poesy? I see now, someone's havin' a bit o' fun with the both of us, likely some young'uns. Haha! I'll rest easy now, I can tell ye that.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB606_00888_MAUCOLYN_000_081えっ？　雪だるまが喋ったって？
またまたァ～、冗談はよしてくれよ。寒いぜ！
